definition: USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: These clever handmade USB drives are perfect for wine lovers.
sentences.chinese: 这些精致的手工制作优盘尤其适合爱酒的人。

sentences.english: Locked flash drive will protect your data from unauthorized access.
sentences.chinese: 挂锁优盘可以防止你的数据被越权存取。

sentences.english: Flash drive made out of concrete will securely store your data.
sentences.chinese: 用混凝土制成的优盘可以安全地存储你的数据。

sentences.english: Cool key shaped design of this drive is functional and memorable.
sentences.chinese: 这款酷钥匙型优盘既实用又令人难忘。

sentences.english: Disposable flash drives concept designed by Art Lebedev Studio.
sentences.chinese: Lebedev艺术工作室的概念设计，一次性优盘。

sentences.english: It is actually a USB flash drive.
Creative USB flash drive looks like broken in half USB cable.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是断成两截的USB线的创意优盘。

sentences.english: Working USB flash drive was integrated into a rubber chicken.
sentences.chinese: 工作用的优盘和橡胶鸡合为一体。

definition: USB flash drive/jump drive/thumb drive/memory stick
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱
compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
